auth_failed.title: Duux Fan Authentication Failed
auth_failed.description:
The JWT token for your Duux fan (Device ID: {device_id}) has expired or is invalid. Please update your integration configuration with a fresh token.

To obtain a new token:
1. Use a network proxy tool (Proxyman, Wireshark, or Charles Proxy)
2. Set up SSL proxying for the Duux API host
3. Use the Duux mobile app to control your fan
4. Extract the new JWT token from the Authorization header
5. Reconfigure the integration with the new token
